content: I have not read it, but someone who has read the book "On the origin of species" by Charles Darwin guarantees that he claims that all living beings – plants, insects, reptiles, birds, dinosaurs, whales, man – descend from a common ancestor, from which they evolved, diversifying according to a law he calls "natural selection".
translations: ita:Io non l'ho letto, ma chiunque abbia letto il libro Sull'origine delle specie garantisce che Charles Darwin afferma che
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
